response:
Here's a list of 50 prompts to generate short stories in a Python list format:

```python
story_prompts = [
    "A child discovers a hidden door in their bedroom that wasn't there yesterday.",
    "A librarian finds a book that predicts the future, but only one day ahead.",
    "An elderly person receives mysterious letters from their younger self.",
    "A dog walker discovers they can suddenly understand what the dogs are saying.",
    "A chef's food starts to evoke powerful memories in those who eat it.",
    "A person wakes up to find everyone in the world has disappeared except them.",
    "A gardener discovers a plant that grows precious gems instead of flowers.",
    "A subway commuter notices the same stranger on every train, no matter the time or line.",
    "A photographer's camera captures images of people's true emotions rather than their faces.",
    "A person discovers they can freeze time, but only for 10 seconds per day.",
    "A museum night guard notices the artifacts are moving between shifts.",
    "A child's imaginary friend turns out to be not so imaginary after all.",
    "A person receives a package containing items from their future.",
    "A scientist discovers a way to communicate with houseplants and learns their secrets.",
    "A barista realizes they can influence customers' days by what they draw in the coffee foam.",
    "A lighthouse keeper witnesses something extraordinary wash up on shore during a storm.",
    "A person inherits a house with a room that changes its interior every day.",
    "A taxi driver picks up a passenger who knows everything about their life.",
    "A custodian at a high school discovers messages from the future written on the desks.",
    "A person finds that their shadow has started acting independently.",
    "A baker's bread causes people to speak only the truth for one hour after eating it.",
    "A bird watcher discovers a species that shouldn't exist in their backyard.",
    "A person starts receiving text messages from their own phone number with warnings.",
    "A postal worker delivers a letter addressed to themselves from 50 years in the future.",
    "A person discovers they can enter the worlds of paintings when no one is looking.",
    "A mechanic finds that cars tell them their life stories while being repaired.",
    "A child's snow globe contains a miniature version of their town with tiny moving people.",
    "A person realizes their dreams are actually glimpses into parallel universes.",
    "A teacher notices that one student in class never casts a shadow.",
    "A hiker finds a trail that doesn't appear on any map and leads to somewhere impossible.",
    "A person discovers they can taste the emotions of whoever prepared their food.",
    "A night security guard at a department store notices the mannequins change positions.",
    "A person finds an old polaroid camera that shows pictures of what will happen five minutes in the future.",
    "A mail carrier delivers to a house that appears only on rainy Tuesdays.",
    "A person discovers that their houseplant is writing them messages in fallen leaves.",
    "A bookstore owner finds that certain books physically pull customers toward them.",
    "A person starts finding origami animals that unfold into messages when they're alone.",
    "A bus driver's route takes them to a different version of the city one foggy morning.",
    "A person discovers they can hear the thoughts of anyone whose name they write down.",
    "A child's collection of seashells whispers secrets of the ocean at night.",
    "A person finds that every time they look in a mirror, their reflection is slightly different.",
    "A musician discovers that their new guitar can play the songs of people's lives.",
    "A person notices that their apartment building looks completely different on the outside than it does inside.",
    "A doctor realizes they can see how much time patients have left by looking into their eyes.",
    "A person finds a watch that allows them to rewind time, but only by one minute.",
    "A crossing guard discovers they can see which path each child's life will take.",
    "A person's new smart speaker starts answering questions they haven't asked yet.",
    "A hairdresser finds that cutting someone's hair gives them glimpses of that person's memories.",
    "A person discovers a coffee shop that only appears during rainstorms.",
    "A night shift worker notices that the world is slightly different between 2:00 and 4:00 AM."
]
```

These prompts cover a range of genres including magical realism, science fiction, fantasy, and the supernatural, providing a good variety for generating short stories.
prompt: provide me 50 prompts to generate short stories in a python list
